thread.title: Breitbart's Sean Spicer Interview Is Painful To Watch
thread.title_full: Breitbart's Sean Spicer Interview Is Painful To Watch

author: Rebecca Shapiro
title: Breitbart's Sean Spicer Interview Is Painful To Watch
text:
Breitbart's Sean Spicer Interview Is Painful To Watch There were some technical difficulties. 02/10/2017 07:48 am ET Rebecca Shapiro Senior Editor, The Huffington Post 
White House press secretary Sean Spicer granted Breitbart.com an exclusive interview Thursday following a federal appeals court’s decision to decline the Justice Department’s urgent request to restore President Donald Trump ’s controversial travel ban . 
The website went live on its Facebook page and well... 
The interview suffered from moments of awkward silence, unpleasant background noises and some strange camera angles. 
Watch the whole interview in the video above. 
Do you have information you want to share with the Huffington Post? Here’s how. Also on HuffPost
